main event: A witness near Lyons, Nebraska observed a bright light in the east that appeared brighter than the city lights and then went out.
interesting points: The object was described as being brighter than a star and was observed for about 30 seconds,The light seemed to get brighter before disappearing,The witness expressed an active interest in UFO phenomena,There were additional reports of a fireball seen in Ord, Nebraska, which has been observed multiple times over the past year,Some residents speculated that the fireball could be a celestial phenomenon or a type of aircraft.
sighted object: A bright light and a fireball
witness description: The witness reported seeing a bright light in the eastern sky.
